item.description:
Saturday May 22nd MinuteMan trail (Lexington to Bedford)


  • Park in municipal lot behind CVS/Starbucks (1735 mass ave)
  • Meet at 1:15 pm the Depot bldg (near the water fountain/dog bowl, just before Meriam Street/Mass Ave)
  • We'll leave at 1:30pm


It's my first time out this year so I will be going at slow pace for about an hour - everyone welcome!
item.name: MinuteMan Trail - Lexington to Bedford (at a 'take it easy' level)
